solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean canJump(int[] A) {--newline--        int max = 0;--newline--        for(int i=0;i<A.length;i++){--newline--            if(i>max) {return false;}--newline--            max = Math.max(A[i]+i,max);--newline--        }--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}
